Mission & Vision
VISION 2035
VISION 2025
SASTRA's Vision and Mission reflects its commitment towards providing quality higher education, undertake meaningful research and create overall progress amongst the stakeholders involved.
SASTRA’s Vision is "To be a world class university engaging in meaningful research & development offering quality education to the students and other learners."
The Mission statement of SASTRA is "To impart value–based higher education turning out good scholars who are at the same time good individuals and good citizens in order that they may become useful members of an enlightened humane society."
The goals and objectives of SASTRA to realize the vision are:
To become a role model Institution for higher learning
To offer contemporary & flexible curriculum with a blend of inter-disciplinary courses to diverse students through impactful pedagogy
To establish Research Centres of Excellence in niche areas to address global challenges and local needs
To nurture research, innovation and entrepreneurship
To engage in National Mission projects involving health care, manufacturing, digital, environment, clean energy and skill development
To strengthen collaborations with premier Indian and Foreign Institutions and industries for academics and research
To offer consultancy & testing services and executive training programmes for corporates
To extend the benefits of higher education transcending geographical boundaries through online programmes
To engage in extension activities and field outreach programmes for societal development
To continue to adopt green practices for reducing carbon footprint
